snippet: The doctor involved in the lethal injection in Oklahoma was sprayed with blood when, in an attempt to insert an intravenous line, he struck an artery, according to documents filed in a federal lawsuit.
abstract: Federal District Court document details gruesome bungling by doctor involved in execution of Clayton D Lockett in Oklahoma in April; brief, filed in lawsuit seeking to stop the executions of four prisoners in early 2015, also provides new evidence of poor training and disarray among state officials.
lead_paragraph: The doctor involved in the lethal injection in Oklahoma was sprayed with blood when, in an attempt to insert an intravenous line, he struck an artery, according to documents filed in a federal lawsuit.

headline.main: Grisly Execution in Oklahoma Detailed in Court Brief
headline.print_headline: Grisly Execution Detailed in Court Brief
